documents.document: @PrinceJvstin @RobHBedford Our animals give me so many tales lol.
@RobHBedford @PrinceJvstin He was really close friends with a gimpy duck we used to have (gimp due to injured foot from a dog).
@RobHBedford @PrinceJvstin He was massive and I was weary of tripping in his yard in case he was hungry.
@RobHBedford @PrinceJvstin Nope, not too dark lol, and correct. He was named accordingly and while taken care of lovingly, he wasn't a pet.
@giddythings This is the first time I've seen this, thank you.
Perfectly stated. https://t.co/PkWuFkgMhU
@RobHBedford @PrinceJvstin Aww, that's a sweet name.
@PrinceJvstin @RobHBedford He's an ornery pig but he and my grandpa had a grand time lol.
@PrinceJvstin @RobHBedford Our other pig's name WAS Porkchop. He's now in the freezer.
@RobHBedford @PrinceJvstin He's very spoiled. Was BFF with my grandpa. When grandpa passed, Albert kept coming insi… https://t.co/oesh6n6BQ2
@PrinceJvstin @RobHBedford I'd pass by on a cold, windy day with Albert all snug in her house and her beside it. Sigh.
@PrinceJvstin @RobHBedford Yep. He will commandeer them to sleep in. We had to move one dog to where Albert couldn't get to so he'd stop.
@RobHBedford @PrinceJvstin Even Albert sometimes passes through. He'll come in the front door and straight to the back door.
@RobHBedford @PrinceJvstin lol if it were my house, paws would be clean of mud. My aunt and uncle gave up trying to keep it clean long ago.
@PrinceJvstin @RobHBedford 12 sleep indoors, 7 have dog houses outside. (With spare doghouses all around since Albert the pig steals em.)
@PrinceJvstin @RobHBedford My aunt was handing out treats lol. That's the only reason so many are in focus.
@RobHBedford @PrinceJvstin I don't think I could ever get all nineteen to sit still for a photo op, but here's a fe… https://t.co/xAbKhsopaU
@KameronHurley @michaeldthomas Sam is a super sweetie that never barks and isn't afraid of anything.

@KameronHurley @michaeldthomas We're thinking at least two sets of twins, plus a single. One is so large, she might have more than two.
@KameronHurley @michaeldthomas They maintain it has to be an odd # of dogs, 25 works. Baby goats due next month, so that number will go up.
